feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.48
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2189
  • Update zh-Hant-TW.json by @abc0922001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2191
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2207
  • Fix "Forbidden" error for APKMirror (#1973)
  • Switch from title case to sentence case + minor wording change (#2195, #2197)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.47...v1.1.48

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.49
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: automatically export on changes (#2209) by @Nishantsingh11 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2218
  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2211
  • Catalan translation by @Cambrells in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2223
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2225
  • Ensure headers are still sent when URL request is redirected (#1973)
  • Add 'ETag header' option for HTML and direct APK links (#2221)

  • Ensure links on add app page do not overlap/merge (#2216)

  • NOTE: The bugfix for #1973 may break some HTML source configurations.

  • This is because, for source URLs that lead to redirected pages, Obtainium was incorrectly sending a "Dart" user-agent header to the redirect page (instead of the headers set in the "additional options" section of the app configuration).
  • To fix this, delete the default "User-Agent" header for your broken app configuration.
    • You may also need to add this new one (unlikely). Try: User-Agent: Dart/3.7 (dart:io)

New Contributors

  • @Nishantsingh11 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2218
  • @Cambrells made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2223

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.48...v1.1.49

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.50
entry.content:

  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2247:
  • Remove Oxford comma (#2245)
  • Show error dialog box when error notification tapped (#2246)

New Contributors

What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.50...v1.1.51

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.52
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2265:
  • Always follow redirects and store cookies between redirects, including for downloads — useful for https://xeiaso.net/blog/2025/anubis (https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/issues/2264)
  • Even more flexibility in the HTML source — JSON string extraction fallback (https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/issues/2262)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.51...v1.1.52
